title: pcald267
author: pcald267
content: You pay me 90$, to get 100$ in your betting account, any US platform... prizepicks, stake.us, fanduel

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 07:25:08 AMYou pay me 90$, to get 100$ in your betting account, any US platform... prizepicks, stake.us, fanduelHope you don’t mind to throw more light on this or are you in any form running a deposit bonus program or how to you intend to get this accounts credited?And hope you aren’t expecting someone to send you a $90 with expectations to receive a $100 in their betting account and I’m sorry to say that if this is another scam trick then it’s too cheap as no one will be willing to fall for this and this might also attract a red tag on your account if care isn’t taken and I will be hoping to see you give more details on how you intend to get this whole deal done.But for the meantime, I wouldn’t advise anyone to take this serious and stay very careful while dealing and possibly seek an escrow if the need be .

comments.author: pcald267
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on December 16, 2023, 07:32:23 AMQuote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 07:25:08 AMYou pay me 90$, to get 100$ in your betting account, any US platform... prizepicks, stake.us, fanduelHope you don’t mind to throw more light on this or are you in any form running a deposit bonus program or how to you intend to get this accounts credited?And hope you aren’t expecting someone to send you a $90 with expectations to receive a $100 in their betting account and I’m sorry to say that if this is another scam trick then it’s too cheap as no one will be willing to fall for this and this might also attract a red tag on your account if care isn’t taken and I will be hoping to see you give more details on how you intend to get this whole deal done.But for the meantime, I wouldn’t advise anyone to take this serious and stay very careful while dealing and possibly seek an escrow if the need be .thank you for your opinion but I'm not look to catfish anyone. I'm not against any form of escrow, but this is simply an exchange. I have my ways around this and it's my intention to utilize the skill, to earn myself some money.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This is scam, scam and scamQuote from: Obari on December 16, 2023, 07:32:23 AMHope you don’t mind to throw more light on this or are you in any form running a deposit bonus program or how to you intend to get this accounts credited?I think you have been on am this forum for some quite number of months, you should be able to know scammers and that you should avoid them. There is nothing that OP is trying to do than to scam people. But no one will be fool to be scammed like this on this forum.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Quote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 07:25:08 AMYou pay me 90$, to get 100$ in your betting account, any US platform... prizepicks, stake.us, fanduelHow are you going to earn with such? I am smelling like Twitter Vitalik Buterin promo/giveaway 2.0. Like send this xx amount and I'll send you back this xx amount.Quote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 07:41:19 AMthank you for your opinion but I'm not look to catfish anyone. I'm not against any form of escrow, but this is simply an exchange. I have my ways around this and it's my intention to utilize the skill, to earn myself some money.Will you mind to explain and disclose what's with this exchange that you do? With all of the stuff and news that we hear today about money laundering, care to say your method?

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 07:41:19 AMQuote from: Obari on December 16, 2023, 07:32:23 AMQuote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 07:25:08 AM~snip~~snip~thank you for your opinion but I'm not look to catfish anyone. I'm not against any form of escrow, but this is simply an exchange. I have my ways around this and it's my intention to utilize the skill, to earn myself some money.Please you aren’t making any clear point and I still maintain the fact that no one would want to pay any reasonable attention to you because they might be skeptical about the whole deal and since your account has no reputation, it will be nice if you give a detailed explanation of how this will be done as well give previous sample of your works at least that will even let someone ask you further questions.Scam attempts are grown at heavily in the forum and I don’t want to tag you a scammer yet that’s why I’m giving you the benefit of doubt , good luck Quote from: _act_ on December 16, 2023, 08:36:29 AMThis is scam, scam and scamYeahBut I don’t want to draw conclusions yet Quote from: _act_ on December 16, 2023, 08:36:29 AMQuote from: Obari on December 16, 2023, 07:32:23 AMHope you don’t mind to throw more light on this or are you in any form running a deposit bonus program or how to you intend to get this accounts credited?I think you have been on am this forum for some quite number of months, you should be able to know scammers and that you should avoid them. There is nothing that OP is trying to do than to scam people. But no one will be fool to be scammed like this on this forum.lol I know a scam when I see one but on the other hand, I think we are to quick to judge or conclude on people’s ideas maybe because of past experiences, I know the drill that we shouldn’t trust any story online but in some cases we should be willing to give people a listening ear.N/B: I  really wanted him to explain more better because it seems too real to be true as no one sells something to make loss but rather expect profit

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: tabas on December 16, 2023, 08:44:31 AMHow are you going to earn with such? I am smelling like Twitter Vitalik Buterin promo/giveaway 2.0. Like send this xx amount and I'll send you back this xx amount.This would be what the OP will later said if I am not wrong. And what is it, it is just the old scam means that may be used to scam some newbies. Quote from: Obari on December 16, 2023, 12:15:07 PMBut I don’t want to draw conclusions yetI did not draw conclusion just like that but it is just what I read in the OP that makes me have such conclusion which I think is absolutely accurate. Let the OP convince us that I am wrong.

comments.author: pcald267
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on December 16, 2023, 08:36:29 AMThis is scam, scam and scamQuote from: Obari on December 16, 2023, 07:32:23 AMHope you don’t mind to throw more light on this or are you in any form running a deposit bonus program or how to you intend to get this accounts credited?I think you have been on am this forum for some quite number of months, you should be able to know scammers and that you should avoid them. There is nothing that OP is trying to do than to scam people. But no one will be fool to be scammed like this on this forum.this is absurd for a Hero Member with merits to bully OP's and get away with it, if you goal is to prevent scam. Please come to DM and inquire as to how I intend to fund, so I can clear your doubts... like I said earlier, it's more of an exchange situation. I don't need to disclose how I intend to fund anyone's betting account until I'm asked to do so. You can try all you want, but I'm not disclosing my method on the thread for it to become useless.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 12:54:29 PMPlease come to DM and inquire as to how I intend to fund, so I can clear your doubts...~You can try all you want, but I'm not disclosing my method on the thread for it to become useless.This is just stupid!So you're ready to tell your method to somebody else despite having no guarantee the next second that guy will come and post everything here but you feel afraid you method might get public at the same time.The reason why you' re not telling this in the open is because you plan to select the most gullible to scam, you won't do it with a veteran that would small your bs from a  million miles and you try to pick your victims before word gets out, that's all!

comments.author: pcald267
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on December 16, 2023, 01:20:20 PMQuote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 12:54:29 PMPlease come to DM and inquire as to how I intend to fund, so I can clear your doubts...~You can try all you want, but I'm not disclosing my method on the thread for it to become useless.This is just stupid!So you're ready to tell your method to somebody else despite having no guarantee the next second that guy will come and post everything here but you feel afraid you method might get public at the same time.The reason why you' re not telling this in the open is because you plan to select the most gullible to scam, you won't do it with a veteran that would small your bs from a  million miles and you try to pick your victims before word gets out, that's all!You are so desperate to see me fall and fail, I'll be here.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: pcald267 on December 16, 2023, 07:25:08 AMYou pay me 90$, to get 100$ in your betting account, any US platform... prizepicks, stake.us, fanduelYour intention seems nothing to me but scamming. What you will do and what will be the benefit of you. I don't think there would have any way to get more than 10% bonus on deposit at any time while you are telling about all the US gambling site. I think you may scam in several way as mentioned below:*** not depositing on the site*** deposit scam/hack/stolen fund *** transferred fund from hack accounts and there might have many more like this.
